text: EBSCO is the world's leading provider
of research and knowledge services.

AWS Cloud Institute has
been a terrific partner
and a creative partner in working with us

as a global employer with
thousands of employees,

and we're really excited
about the opportunity
to influence the program

and leverage the talent
that comes out of it.
It takes a long time to recruit talent
with the right skillset in the cloud.

This program is really
creating an opportunity for us
to curate that talent,

be sure they're coming
with the right skills.
AWS Cloud Institute goes above

and beyond what we see coming
through our talent pipeline.

One of my favorite things
about the program is
how the curriculum evolves quarter over

quarter over quarter,
year over year.
Some great examples of that are the new AI
and Amazon Bedrock components.
AWS Cloud Institute empowers us
to move faster, onboard quicker,
and ensure that our talent is coming in
ready to hit the ground running.

It's truly been fascinating
to see the candidates

that the program has been
attracting. The richness in durable

and soft skills that they're
bringing to the table

with re-skilling and up-skilling
candidates from different

industries really has the
opportunity to add some depth
